name: Sen
overview: Sen is an adventure game with graphics presented in the form of photographs. The action takes place in a dream and your task is to find a way to wake up. The place of gameplay is a backyard, home interior, beach and cemetery. The character moves with the directional arrows. He can carry up to eight items that can be used and combined. The player has a limited energy (time indicator), that can be supplemented by eating an apple or a roll.
